author: behkod
content: But we're already counting some coins that can never move, like the ones w/ lost keys (that we consider those as being HODL)

author: behkod
content: I don't intentionally do that. I mean this is a mistake that's already being made by chart/report providers. We're already counting "coins that never move"

author: potuz
content: What I mean is consider whatever is in the deposit contract and not consider the beacon chain. Whenever a full withdrawal is made, subtract 32ETH from the contract. This does not have the problem of having to check a bound as in <@144468805697929216> comment's, but there's the issue of distinguising full withdrawals from partial ones. If we didn't have BLS accounts it would be easy to just consider full anything that has above ejection balance.
